an4.230:4.1: … pe … Assaddho hoti, dussīlo hoti, kusīto hoti, duppañño hoti … pe … saddho hoti, sīlavā hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti—
an4.230:4.2: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo viññūnaṃ, bahuñca puññaṃ pasavatī”ti.
